title: Divide
brief_description: Israelists and th eland of Canaan - ancient Biblical history of migration and settlement slongside pioneering the Australian Bush - colonisation and settlemetnt, sheep and cattle faming.European settlement of a harsh and alien landscape, the great dividing range. Journey.
